function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced circulation of fresh air in buildings","Impact":"Increased presence of VOCs and other contaminants, leading to health issues","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation systems, use air purifiers, and reduce the use of synthetic materials","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, indoor air quality monitors","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Increased presence of VOCs in indoor environments","Impact":"Higher risk of hypersensitivity and other health issues","Mitigation":"Reduce the consumption of chemical products and synthetic materials, improve ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, VOC sensors","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"High percentage of time spent indoors","Impact":"Increased exposure to indoor air pollutants and hazards","Mitigation":"Improve indoor air quality, increase ventilation, and reduce the presence of pollutants","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitors, ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
